name: Solumnoid
description:
Year XX99: A little robot begins its mission of cultivating Star Seeds on a barren Earth. Its journey is one of creative platforming puzzles, focusing on pushing and jumping, with a carefully-constructed difficulty curve.

Features:

  • Old-school, mechanics-based puzzling
  • Speedy game flow with a shortcut for everything
  • Melancholic and nonviolent atmosphere
  • 3 distinct regions
  • 53 levels on a branching path
  • Unique, regenerative level skip function
  • In-game level editor
  • 6-part original soundtrack
  • Xbox 360 controller support
  • Flexible and simple keyboard controls for any age/ability
  • Generative-art-related secrets
  • Moon, stars, & meteors

Solumnoid is currently Windows only.  Free demo available here.

Windows can sometimes flag game exe files created with Game Maker Studio as viruses incorrectly.  If this is happening to you with the Solumnoid exe file from the zip, please download the installer instead.
